bugReport.Title: The link [Share price] redirects to the english page from Trading Course 1, section 2 when AR, NL, VI, TH or ZN is chosen

Steps.Step4: Click the [Who are the main market players?] row in the Introduction to Financial Markets box
Steps.Step5: Select AR, NL, VI, TH or ZN language
Steps.Step6: Scroll to the second to the last paragraph

bugReport.ExpectedResult: The link [Share price] redirects to the page translated into chosen language
bugReport.ActualResult: The link [Share price] redirects to the english page
bugReport.Author: @xenia513
